tasks.title: Project Setup and Configuration
tasks.description: Set up initial project structure, virtual environment, and configuration management
tasks.testing: Verify project structure exists and virtual environment activates correctly
tasks.notes: Foundation task for all other work

tasks.title: Configuration Validation
tasks.description: Implement configuration validation with required field checks and default value application
tasks.testing: Run test_config_validator.py, verify all assertions pass
tasks.notes: Implemented ConfigValidator with nested value support, default application, field type validation. Added edge case tests for deeply nested configs, multiple missing fields, and value preservation.

tasks.title: Secrets Management
tasks.description: Implement secure loading of environment variables and secret resolution
tasks.testing: Verify secrets load from .env and placeholders resolve correctly
tasks.notes: Implemented secrets_loader.py with loadEnvFile(), resolveSecrets(), loadConfigWithSecrets(), getSecret(), and maskSecret(). Supports ${VAR} and ${VAR:default} syntax. Never logs or exposes actual secret values. Added comprehensive edge case tests (30 tests passing).

tasks.title: Logging Infrastructure
tasks.description: Set up structured logging with configurable levels and output formats
tasks.testing: Verify logs output correctly at all levels, sensitive data is masked
tasks.notes: Implemented logging_config.py with PIIMaskingFilter, StructuredFormatter, LogContext, setupLogging(), getLogger(), and logWithContext(). PII masking for emails, phones, SSNs. Console and file output support. 41 tests passing in test_logging_config.py.

tasks.title: Error Handling Framework
tasks.description: Implement centralized error handling with classification and retry logic
steps: Add retry decorator with exponential backoff
tasks.testing: Verify retryable errors retry correctly, config errors fail fast
tasks.notes: Verified existing error_handler.py implementation with comprehensive test suite (56 tests passing). Features: ErrorCategory enum, BaseError with toDict(), RetryableError/AuthenticationError/ConfigurationError/DataError/SystemError exceptions, classifyError() for auto-classification based on error type/message, retry() decorator with exponential backoff and custom exception support, handleError() with logging by category, formatError() for display, ErrorCollector for batch processing.

tasks.title: Core Application Entry Point
tasks.description: Create main entry point with CLI argument parsing and workflow orchestration
tasks.testing: Verify application starts with valid config, fails gracefully with invalid config
tasks.notes: Verified existing main.py implementation with comprehensive test suite (28 tests passing). Features: parseArgs() with --config, --env-file, --dry-run, --verbose, --version flags; loadConfiguration() integrates secrets_loader and config_validator; runWorkflow() placeholder with dry-run support; main() orchestrates flow with proper exit codes (EXIT_SUCCESS=0, EXIT_CONFIG_ERROR=1, EXIT_RUNTIME_ERROR=2, EXIT_UNKNOWN_ERROR=3). Handles ConfigurationError, KeyboardInterrupt, and unexpected exceptions gracefully.

tasks.title: Test Framework Setup
tasks.description: Set up pytest with fixtures, coverage reporting, and test utilities
tasks.testing: Run pytest, verify tests execute and coverage reports generate
tasks.notes: Verified existing test framework setup: tests/ folder with __init__.py, conftest.py with comprehensive fixtures (sampleConfig, minimalConfig, invalidConfig, envVars, cleanEnv, mockLogger, mockApiResponse, mockDbConnection, tempConfigFile, tempEnvFile, assertNoLogs), pytest configuration in pyproject.toml with markers (slow, integration, unit), coverage configuration with 80% minimum threshold. Created test_utils.py with: createTestConfig(), createTestRecord(), createTestRecords() factories; assertDictSubset(), assertRaisesWithMessage(), assertWithinRange() assertion helpers; temporaryEnvVars(), temporaryFile(), temporaryJsonFile(), captureTime() context managers; createMockResponse(), createMockCursor(), createMockConnection() mock helpers; waitForCondition(), retry() async helpers; TestDataManager class. Created run_all_tests.py for unified test execution. 165 tests passing across 4 modules.

tasks.title: Documentation

tasks.testing: Review documentation for completeness and accuracy
tasks.notes: Updated all documentation to be project-specific for Eclipse OBD-II Performance Monitoring System. README.md updated with project overview, hardware requirements, quick start guide. architecture.md updated with OBD-II specific data flows, database schema, display architecture. methodology.md updated with TDD workflow, Ralph agent instructions, test utilities reference. standards.md updated with project-specific patterns (ConfigValidator, SecretsLoader, PIIMaskingFilter). All 165 tests passing.
